meanings.sent1: The knight was doughtier than the dragon in the story.
meanings.sent2: She showed her doughtier side when facing her fears.
meanings.sent3: The doughtier squirrel bravely faced the nut thief.
meanings.sent4: Her doughtier spirit shone brightly in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The doughtier lion fearlessly protected its pride.

meanings.definition: More brave or courageous than someone else
meanings.sent1: He proved to be doughtier than his rival in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The doughtier soldier led the charge into battle.
meanings.sent3: The doughtier cat fearlessly chased away the neighborhood bully.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her the doughtier candidate for the job.
meanings.sent5: The doughtier firefighter rushed into the burning building to save lives.
